# deleteItems(_:)

**Instance Method**

Deletes the items with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func deleteItems(_ identifiers: [ItemIdentifierType])
```

## Parameters

- **identifiers**: The array of identifiers corresponding to the items to delete from the snapshot.

## Removing items and sections

- **deleteAllItems()**: Deletes all of the items from the snapshot.
- **deleteSections(_:)**: Deletes the sections with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.

items.description: Deletes all of the items from the snapshot.
items.name: deleteAllItems()

items.description: Deletes the sections with the specified identifiers from the snapshot.
